attributes.action: conduct a time and motion study called "Walk in my shoes" to analyse nursing workload
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On average, nurses walk 8 miles per day ... mostly unnecessary - is there anything that researchers can do to help and cut this down to facilitate easy working practices ? e.g. streamline facilities - look where most journies are made and relocate them.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
